Title: Repeals section 260.15 of the penal law relating to affirmative defenses to the charge of endangering the welfare of a child
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to affirmative defenses to the charge of endangering the welfare of a child.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal section 260.15 of the penal law relating to affirmative defenses to the charge of endangering the welfare of a child
